name: Buttons with 360 Variants & autolayout
description:
A button component built using variants and autolayout! This button component is a greater starter component for your design system.


Variant Properties:

  • Size (L,S)
  • Style (Primary, Secondary, Ghost, Only Text)
  • State (Default, Hover, Pressed, Disabled)
  • Light/Dark mode
  • Icon Only
  • Icon Right
  • Icon Left


Enjoy it!


#GL
